nodes.text: Lucasfilm Animation is a division of Lucasfilm Ltd. that was founded in 2003. It is a digital animation studio that produces Lucasfilm's animated content for films, games, and television. Lucasfilm Animation was responsible for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars 3D animated television series, in conjunction with Lucasfilm Animation Singapore. The studio also produced Star Wars Rebels, the unreleased Star Wars Detours television series, Star Wars: Forces of Destiny, Star Wars Resistance, and a variety of television series for Disney+.
Cary Silver is currently the executive producer at Lucasfilm Animation.
